Description
fr.cnrs.iees.rvgrid.rendezvous
The rendezvous pattern.

A very simple example of implementation of the rendezvous pattern.
fr.cnrs.iees.rvgrid.statemachine
Implementation of a finite-state machine using the rendezvous pattern.
